short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Immerse yourself in the awe-inspiring beauty of the Northern Lights Horizon.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform your new tab into a breathtaking display of auroras lighting up the night sky in vivid hues of green, purple, and blue. The stunning background features a vast mountain range and tranquil rivers, creating a serene yet captivating view. As shooting stars streak across the sky, this theme offers the perfect escape for stargazers and nature lovers alike. But that’s not all – this extension also includes practical features to enhance your browsing experience:
- Real-Time Date & Time: Stay updated with the current date and time, right on your new tab page.
- Location Information: View your current location for a personalized touch.
